about_the_game:
Melly the naughty dog is a point and click puzzle game short but sweet I think though it has been made a lower price because of how quick that game can take to complete safe for anyone to play no matter who you are and is a game where you play as a naughty dog click movement with different puzzles to traverse through melly's dream world meet characters on the way to finishing the story and help melly get back home with his Jug.

This game has hand drawn art in it , including some digital art I was going to add more digital art but I wasnt sure what looked better so the game has some parts
that are a bit of both, also the game is very funny and can be played with friends to all laugh at the screen or enjoy it on your own.

Melly wakes up from a deep sleep after his owner finishes playing his video game to enter a dream world where he changes for the better after going through
different levels and puzzles you meet the fairy dog and the knight to help reclaim the jug!

2d art puzzle point and click story based game - melly the naughty dog
detailed_description:
Melly the naughty dog is a point and click puzzle game short but sweet I think though it has been made a lower price because of how quick that game can take to complete safe for anyone to play no matter who you are and is a game where you play as a naughty dog click movement with different puzzles to traverse through melly's dream world meet characters on the way to finishing the story and help melly get back home with his Jug.

This game has hand drawn art in it , including some digital art I was going to add more digital art but I wasnt sure what looked better so the game has some parts
that are a bit of both, also the game is very funny and can be played with friends to all laugh at the screen or enjoy it on your own.

Melly wakes up from a deep sleep after his owner finishes playing his video game to enter a dream world where he changes for the better after going through
different levels and puzzles you meet the fairy dog and the knight to help reclaim the jug!

2d art puzzle point and click story based game - melly the naughty dog
name: Melly the naughty dog

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Atom® Processor D2500
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 400

short_description: Melly the Naughty Dog is a short, funny point-and-click puzzle game with hand-drawn and digital art. Play as Melly, navigating his dream world, solving puzzles, and meeting characters like the fairy dog and the knight to reclaim his jug and return home.
